elements.description:
A list of requests related to a project in the ARC main menu.

The element requires the `arc-models/project-model` element to be present
in the DOM to update requests order.

### Example

```
<projects-menu-requests
 project-id="some-id"
 selected-request="id-of-selected"></projects-menu-requests>
```

### Styling
`<saved-menu>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--projects-menu-requests` | Mixin applied to the element | `{}`
`--projects-menu-requests-background-color` | Background color of the menu | `#f7f7f7`
`--projects-menu-requests-selected-method-label-background-color` | Background color of the POST method label when the item is focused | `#fff`
`--projects-menu-requests-list-item` | Mixin applied to each list item | `{}`
`--projects-menu-requests-selected-item-background-color` | Background color of the selected list item | `#FF9800`
`--projects-menu-requests-selected-item-color` | Color of the selected list item | `#fff`
`--projects-menu-requests-name-label` | Mixin applied to the name label | `{}`
`--warning-primary-color` | Main color of the warning messages | `#FF7043`
`--warning-contrast-color` | Contrast color for the warning color | `#fff`
`--error-toast` | Mixin applied to the error toast | `{}`

properties.name: requests
properties.description:
The list of request to render.
It can be eirther saved, history or project items.

properties.name: hasRequests
properties.description: Computed value, true when the project has requests.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Requests list type. Can be one of:
- saved
- history
- project

Depending on the the type request change event is handled differently.
For saved and history requests corresponding type is processed.
For project requests list only request that has project id in the
projects list is processed.

This property must be set.

properties.name: listType
properties.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's peper item with two lines (72px heigth)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px heigth)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px heigth (touch recommended)

properties.name: _hasTwoLines
properties.description:
Computed value if the list item should be consisted of two lines of
description.

properties.name: project
properties.description:
A project object associated with requests.
This is only valid when `type` is project. It is set automatically
when `readProjectRequests()` is called.

properties.name: querying
properties.description: True if the element currently is querying the datastore for the data

properties.name: dataUnavailable
properties.description: Computed value. True if query ended and there's no results.

methods.name: _dispatch
methods.description:
Dispatches bubbling and composed custom event.
By default the event is cancelable until `cancelable` property is set to false.

methods.name: _requestDeletedHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `request-object-deleted` event. Removes request from the list
if it existed.

methods.name: _itemDeleted
methods.description: Removes an item from the list by given id.

methods.name: _historyItemDeleted
methods.description: Removes a history item from the list by given id.

methods.name: _requestChangedHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `request-object-changed` custom event.
Depending on the `type` property it updates / adds / removes item from
the requests list.

methods.name: _projectTypeChanged
methods.description: Handles request change when type is project.

methods.name: _isProjectRequest
methods.description:
Checks if requests is related to current project.
`projectId` has to be set on the element.

methods.name: _savedTypeChanged
methods.description: Handles request change when type is saved or history.

methods.name: _dispatchProjectRead
methods.description: Dispatches `project-read` custom event and returns it.

methods.name: _dispatchProjectList
methods.description: Dispatches `request-project-list` custom event and returns it.

methods.name: _dispatchRequestChanged
methods.description: Dispatches `request-object-changed` custom event and returns it.

methods.name: readProjectRequests
methods.description: A function to read request data for a project.

methods.name: _legacySort
methods.description: Sorts requests list by `projectOrder` property

methods.name: _updateBulk
methods.description: Updates requests in bulk opeartion.

methods.name: _updateRequest
methods.description: Sends the `request-object-changed` custom event for each request on the list.

return.desc: Promise resolved when the request object is updated.

methods.name: _computeHasTwoLines
methods.description: Computes value for `_hasTwoLines` property.

methods.name: _updateListStyles
methods.description:
Updates icon size CSS variable and notifies resize on the list when
list type changes.

methods.name: _persistRequestsOrder
methods.description:
Stores current order of requests in the project.
This shouls be only called wshen `project` property is set.

methods.name: _idsArrayEqual
methods.description: Tests if two arrays has the same order of ids (strings).

return.desc: True when elements are ordered the same way.

methods.name: _dispatchProjectUpdate
methods.description:
Dispatches `project-object-changed` event to inform model to update
the data.

methods.name: _projectChanged
methods.description: Handler for the `project-object-changed` event.

methods.name: _queryData
methods.description: Queries for the data when state or `projectId` changes

methods.name: _computeDataUnavailable
methods.description: Computes value for the `dataUnavailable` property.

methods.name: _openRequest
methods.description: Called when the user clicks on an item in the UI

methods.name: _onReorder
methods.description:
Handler for the list reorder event. Updates requests order in the
datastore.

elements.name: UiElements.ProjectsMenuRequests

attributes.name: requests
attributes.description:
The list of request to render.
It can be eirther saved, history or project items.

attributes.name: has-requests
attributes.description: Computed value, true when the project has requests.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Requests list type. Can be one of:
- saved
- history
- project

Depending on the the type request change event is handled differently.
For saved and history requests corresponding type is processed.
For project requests list only request that has project id in the
projects list is processed.

This property must be set.

attributes.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's peper item with two lines (72px heigth)
Possible values are:

- `compact` - enables list that has 40px heigth (touch recommended)

elements.description:
A list of projects in the ARC main menu.

The element uses direct implementation of the PouchDB to make a query to the
datastore. It also listens to events fired by the `arc-model` elements to
update state of the saved items.

### Example

```html
<projects-menu
 selected-project="project-id"
 selected-request="id-of-selected-request"></projects-menu>
```
### Styling
`<saved-menu>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--projects-menu` | Mixin applied to the element | `{}`
`--projects-menu-background-color` | Background color of the menu | `#f7f7f7`
`--projects-menu-selected-method-label-background-color` | Background color of the POST method label when the item is focused | `#fff`
`--projects-menu-list` | Mixin applied to the list element. | `{}`
`--projects-menu-list-item` | Mixin applied to each list item | `{}`
`--projects-menu-selected-item-background-color` | Background color of the selected list item | `rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.24)`
`--projects-menu-name-label` | Mixin applied to the name label | `{}`
`--projects-menu-project-icon-color` | Color of the "project" icon | `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.64)`
`--projects-menu-selected-project-icon-color` | Color of the "project" icon when selected | `#F57C00`
`--arc-menu-empty-info-color` | Color applied to the empty info section | ``
`--arc-menu-empty-info-title-color` | Color applied to the title in the empty info section | ``
`--projects-menu-open-icon-color` | Color of the open project icon | `{}`
`--context-menu-item-color` | Color of the context menu item | ``
`--context-menu-item-background-color` | Background color of the context menu item | ``
`--context-menu-item-color-hover` | Color of the context menu item when hovered | ``
`--context-menu-item-background-color-hover` | Background color of the context menu item when hovered | ``

properties.name: hasProjects
properties.description: Computed value, true if any project is on the list.

properties.name: noAutoProjects
properties.description:
When set the element won't request projects list when attached to the dom.
When set `refreshProjects()` has to be called manually.

properties.name: dataUnavailable
properties.description: Computed value. True if query ended and there's no results.

properties.name: listType
properties.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's peper item with two lines (72px heigth)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px heigth)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px heigth (touch recommended)

methods.name: _computeHasProjects
methods.description: Computes value for `hasProjects` property

methods.name: _projectDataImportHandler
methods.description: Refreshes projects list when ARC data were imported.

methods.name: _projectDatabaseDestroyedHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `datastore-destroyed` custom event.
Refreshes list of projects afyter clearing the data.

methods.name: refreshProjects
methods.description: Refreshes the list of projects after next render frame.

methods.name: _projectChangedHandler
methods.description:
Handler for non-cancelable `project-object-changed` event.
Updates the project on projects list or adds it if it's new project.

methods.name: _projectDeletedHandler
methods.description:
Handler for `project-object-deleted` custom event.
Removes a project from the list if applicable.
This will not handle cancelable events.

methods.name: _dispatchProjectQueryEvent
methods.description: Dispatches `project-model-query` custom event and returns it.

methods.name: _updateProjectsList
methods.description: Updates list of available projects after the overlay is opened.

methods.name: _projectsSortFn
methods.description: Sort function used to sort projects in order.

methods.name: _computeProjectsAutocomplete
methods.description:
Computes a list of suggestion for autocomplete element.
From the list of `projects` it takes names for each project and returns
new list for suggestions.

methods.name: _handleProjectsError
methods.description: Handles errors.

methods.name: _processSelectedProjectsInfo
methods.description:
Processes projects name list and returns object with
`add` property as a list of project names that do not yet exists and
`existing` property with a list of IDs of existing projects.

params.name: selectedProjects
params.description: List of selected projects to process.

return.desc:
`add` {Array<String>} List of names of a projects to create
- `existing` {Array<String>} List of IDs of existing projects

methods.name: _computeDataUnavailable
methods.description: Computes value for the `dataUnavailable` property.

methods.name: _computeA11yCommand
methods.description:
Computes command label depending on a OS.
For Mac it will be cmd + `key` and for the rest of the World it
will be ctrl + `key`.

params.name: key
params.description: The key combination as a sufix after the command key

params.name: platform
params.description: Current platform name. `navigator.platform` is used by default.

return.desc: Full command to display in command label.

methods.name: _toggleOpen
methods.description: Toggles opened project details.

methods.name: _updateListStyles
methods.description:
Updates icon size CSS variable and notifies resize on the list when
list type changes.

methods.name: _moreClickHandler
methods.description: Cancels click event when "more" button is clicked.

methods.name: _deselectMenuOption
methods.description: Closes paper-listbox holding menu items.

methods.name: _openAllRequests
methods.description: Handler for the click event "open all" menu item.

methods.name: _replaceAllRequests
methods.description: Handler for the click event "replace all" menu item.

methods.name: _dispatchOpenRequests
methods.description: Dispatches `workspace-open-project-requests` event end returns it.

params.name: replace
params.description: When true the requests are to be replaced in the workspace.

methods.name: _openProject
methods.description:
Handler for the click event "details" menu item.
Dispatches "navigate" event

elements.name: UiElements.ProjectsMenu

When set `refreshProjects()` has to be called manually.

attributes.name: list-type

Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's peper item with two lines (72px heigth)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px heigth)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px heigth (touch recommended)
